mapper.insert:
insert into OPAS_LIST_BATCHFILE_INFO
ID,
FILE_NAME,
INPUT_TIME,
INPUT_COUNTS,
FILE_TYPE,
OPERAT_CODE,
OPERATOR,
REMARK,
FILE_STATUS,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{inputTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{inputCounts,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{fileType,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{operatCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fileStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
mapper.select:
select ID, FILE_NAME, INPUT_TIME, INPUT_COUNTS, FILE_TYPE, OPERAT_CODE, OPERATOR, REMARK, FILE_STATUS from OPAS_LIST_BATCHFILE_INFO where 1=1
AND upper(FILE_NAME) LIKE upper('%${fileName}%')
AND FILE_TYPE = #{fileType}
AND (INPUT_TIME BETWEEN #{inputTime} AND (select #{inputTime} + (INTERVAL '23:59:59'hour to second) from dual) )
order by INPUT_TIME desc

select count(1) from OPAS_LIST_BATCHFILE_INFO where 1=1
AND upper(FILE_NAME) LIKE upper('%${fileName}%')
AND FILE_TYPE = #{fileType}
AND (INPUT_TIME BETWEEN #{inputTime} AND (select #{inputTime} + (INTERVAL '23:59:59'hour to second) from dual) )
mapper.insert:
insert into OPAS_RIST_LIST_BATCHFILE_INFO
ID,
FILE_NAME,
INPUT_TIME,
INPUT_COUNTS,
FILE_TYPE,
OPERAT_CODE,
OPERATOR,
REMARK,
FILE_STATUS,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{inputTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{inputCounts,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{fileType,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{operatCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fileStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
mapper.select:
select ID, FILE_NAME, INPUT_TIME, INPUT_COUNTS, FILE_TYPE, OPERAT_CODE, OPERATOR, REMARK, FILE_STATUS from OPAS_RIST_LIST_BATCHFILE_INFO where 1=1
AND upper(FILE_NAME) LIKE upper('%${fileName}%')
AND FILE_TYPE = #{fileType}
AND (INPUT_TIME BETWEEN #{inputTime} AND (select #{inputTime} + (INTERVAL '23:59:59'hour to second) from dual) )
order by INPUT_TIME desc

select count(1) from OPAS_RIST_LIST_BATCHFILE_INFO where 1=1
AND upper(FILE_NAME) LIKE upper('%${fileName}%')
AND FILE_TYPE = #{fileType}
AND (INPUT_TIME BETWEEN #{inputTime} AND (select #{inputTime} + (INTERVAL '23:59:59'hour to second) from dual) )
select OPERATOR from( select OPERATOR from OPAS_LOWRISK_BATCHFILE_INFO order by INPUT_TIME desc ) where rownum = 1
